EmailTemplate.description: This email informs user their SF Request is under consideration
EmailTemplate.name: SF Request Under Consideration
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Salesforce Request Is Under Consideration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Salesforce_Request__c.OwnerFirstName},
Your Salesforce request has been passed to the Product team and is under consideration. If you would like to edit your request or reach out to the Salesforce team via Chatter, you can do so by visiting your ticket: {!Salesforce_Request__c.Link}.
Stay tuned!
